Hello All,


     Glad to be a part of serious REST group. I just started =
to learn about it, been searching from a month now and then for the tutoria=
ls.no tutorial ws found on net for building,explaining the RESTful webservi=
ce (Stress on simple). I was looking for a simple RESTful webservice, so th=

ample from netbeans. I am using netbeans but the example stated was somewha=
